mapper.select: select memnum,memname,memaddr,mempwd,memprofile,memjob,memauth,memmail,meminmail,memmgr,memdept,memhire,memresign,membirth,memsignimg from (select * from member where memnum=1 and mempwd='1004') where memnum=#{memnum}
select memnum,memname from member where memauth=4 and memdept=#{memdept}
mapper.update: update member set memresign=sysdate where memnum=#{memnum}
mapper.select: select m.memnum,m.memname,m.memaddr,m.mempwd,m.memprofile,m.memjob, m.memauth,m.memmail,m.meminmail,m.memmgr,m.memdept,m.memhire,m.memresign,m.membirth,m.memsignimg, d.dename,p.psalary from member m,dept d,pay p where memnum=#{memnum} and d.denum=m.memdept and m.memnum=p.pmem
select pyearly, psalary, trunc((psalary/12),0) pmonthsalary from pay where pmem=#{memnum}
mapper.update: update member set memjob=#{memjob}, memauth=#{memauth} where memnum=#{memnum}
update pay set pyearly=0, psalary=#{psalary} where pmem=#{memnum}
update member set memdept=#{memdept} where memnum=#{memnum}
mapper.select: select distinct(to_char(hisdate,'yyyy')) hisdate from payhistory where hismem=#{memnum}
select bgnum,bname from bname where bdeptno=#{bdeptno}

select sfname, sfnum, sform from signform
where sfname like '%'||#{sfname}||'%'
order by sfnum desc
select memnum,memname from member where memmgr=#{memnum}
mapper.update: update member set memmgr=#{memmgr} where memnum=#{memnum}
